name: RESHARPER
briefIntroduction: One of ReSharper’s most notable features, code inspection, is available even without opening the IDE. InspectCode, a free cross-platform command line tool requires a minimum of one parameter — your solution file — to apply all of ReSharper’s inspections.
description: One of ReSharper’s most notable features, code inspection, is available even without opening the IDE. InspectCode, a free cross-platform command line tool requires a minimum of one parameter — your solution file — to apply all of ReSharper’s inspections.
